<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Clockwork Recorder](/Equipment.aspx?ID=764)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Legends](/Sources.aspx?ID=40) pg. 24

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) Spare wax cylinders for a clockwork recorder cost 3 gp each and are the same rarity as the recorder itself (rare)._

**Price** 250 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This small recording device can be as tiny as a music box or around the size of large book and is typically concealed in hollowed-out books and jewelry. A clockwork recorder can record up to 1 hour of sound before its wax cylinders must be retrieved and replaced. Any given clockwork recorder can play back the recordings of a cylinder, regardless of whether it was the recorder used for the original recording.

**Activate** <actions string="Three Actions" /> Interact;     **Effect** You wind the recorder to start recording sound or to play back a recording. You can have the recording or playback start immediately or be timed to start at any point up to one month later.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Clockwork Recorder
